And<S>2532</S> he said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> there be<S>1526</S> some<S>5100</S> of them that stand<S>2476</S> here<S>5602</S>, which<S>3748</S> shall<S>1089</S> not<S>3364</S> taste<S>1089</S> of death<S>2288</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> they have seen<S>1492</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S> come<S>2064</S> with<S>1722</S> power<S>1411</S>.
And<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> six<S>1803</S> days<S>2250</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> taketh<S>3880</S> with him Peter<S>4074</S>, and<S>2532</S> James<S>2385</S>, and<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S>, and<S>2532</S> leadeth<S>399</S> them<S>846</S> up<S>399</S> into<S>1519</S> an high<S>5308</S> mountain<S>3735</S> apart<S>2596</S> <S>2398</S> by themselves<S>3441</S>: and<S>2532</S> he was transfigured<S>3339</S> before<S>1715</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> raiment<S>2440</S> became<S>1096</S> shining<S>4744</S>, exceeding<S>3029</S> white<S>3022</S> as<S>5613</S> snow<S>5510</S>; so as<S>3634</S> no<S>3756</S> fuller<S>1102</S> on<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S> can<S>1410</S> white<S>3021</S> them.
And<S>2532</S> there appeared<S>3700</S> unto them<S>846</S> Elias<S>2243</S> with<S>4862</S> Moses<S>3475</S>: and<S>2532</S> they were<S>2258</S> talking<S>4814</S> with Jesus<S>2424</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Peter<S>4074</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>3004</S> to Jesus<S>2424</S>, Master<S>4461</S>, it is<S>2076</S> good<S>2570</S> for us<S>2248</S> to be<S>1511</S> here<S>5602</S>: and<S>2532</S> let us make<S>4160</S> three<S>5140</S> tabernacles<S>4633</S>; one<S>3391</S> for thee<S>4671</S>, and<S>2532</S> one<S>3391</S> for Moses<S>3475</S>, and<S>2532</S> one<S>3391</S> for Elias<S>2243</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he wist<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> what<S>5101</S> to say<S>2980</S>; for<S>1063</S> they were sore<S>2258</S> afraid<S>1630</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there was<S>1096</S> a cloud<S>3507</S> that overshadowed<S>1982</S> them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> a voice<S>5456</S> came<S>2064</S> out of<S>1537</S> the cloud<S>3507</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S> Son<S>5207</S>: hear<S>191</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> suddenly<S>1819</S>, when they had looked round about<S>4017</S>, they saw<S>1492</S> no man<S>3762</S> any more<S>3765</S>, save<S>235</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> only<S>3441</S> with<S>3326</S> themselves<S>1438</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as they<S>846</S> came down<S>2597</S> from<S>575</S> the mountain<S>3735</S>, he charged<S>1291</S> them<S>846</S> that<S>2443</S> they should tell<S>1334</S> no man<S>3367</S> what things<S>3739</S> they had seen<S>1492</S>, till<S>1508</S> <S>3752</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> were risen<S>450</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they kept<S>2902</S> that saying<S>3056</S> with<S>4314</S> themselves<S>1438</S>, questioning one with another<S>4802</S> what<S>5101</S> the rising<S>450</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S> should mean<S>2076</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Why<S>3754</S> say<S>3004</S> the scribes<S>1122</S> that<S>3754</S> Elias<S>2243</S> must<S>1163</S> first<S>4412</S> come<S>2064</S>?
And<S>1161</S> he answered<S>611</S> and told<S>2036</S> them<S>846</S>, Elias<S>2243</S> verily<S>3303</S> cometh<S>2064</S> first<S>4412</S>, and restoreth<S>600</S> all things<S>3956</S>; and<S>2532</S> how<S>4459</S> it is written<S>1125</S> of<S>1909</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S>, that<S>2443</S> he must suffer<S>3958</S> many things<S>4183</S>, and<S>2532</S> be set at nought<S>1847</S>.
But<S>235</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> Elias<S>2243</S> is<S>2064</S> indeed<S>2532</S> come<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> they have done<S>4160</S> unto him<S>846</S> whatsoever<S>3745</S> they listed<S>2309</S>, as<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S> of<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he came<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> his disciples<S>3101</S>, he saw<S>1492</S> a great<S>4183</S> multitude<S>3793</S> about<S>4012</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> the scribes<S>1122</S> questioning<S>4802</S> with them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> all<S>3956</S> the people<S>3793</S>, when they beheld<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>, were greatly amazed<S>1568</S>, and<S>2532</S> running to<S>4370</S> him saluted<S>782</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he asked<S>1905</S> the scribes<S>1122</S>, What<S>5101</S> question ye<S>4802</S> with<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>? <sup>with them: or, among yourselves</sup>
And<S>2532</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, I have brought<S>5342</S> unto<S>4314</S> thee<S>4571</S> my<S>3450</S> son<S>5207</S>, which hath<S>2192</S> a dumb<S>216</S> spirit<S>4151</S>;
And<S>2532</S> wheresoever<S>3699</S> <S>302</S> he taketh<S>2638</S> him<S>846</S>, he teareth<S>4486</S> him<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> he foameth<S>875</S>, and<S>2532</S> gnasheth<S>5149</S> with his<S>846</S> teeth<S>3599</S>, and<S>2532</S> pineth away<S>3583</S>: and<S>2532</S> I spake<S>2036</S> to thy<S>4675</S> disciples<S>3101</S> that<S>2443</S> they should cast<S>1544</S> him<S>846</S> out<S>1544</S>; and<S>2532</S> they could<S>2480</S> not<S>3756</S>. <sup>teareth: or, dasheth him</sup>
He answereth<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>1161</S> saith<S>3004</S>, O<S>5599</S> faithless<S>571</S> generation<S>1074</S>, how long<S>2193</S> <S>4219</S> shall I be<S>2071</S> with<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>? how long<S>2193</S> <S>4219</S> shall I suffer<S>430</S> you<S>5216</S>? bring<S>5342</S> him<S>846</S> unto<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they brought<S>5342</S> him<S>846</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> when he saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>, straightway<S>2112</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> tare<S>4682</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> he fell<S>4098</S> on<S>1909</S> the ground<S>1093</S>, and wallowed<S>2947</S> foaming<S>875</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he asked<S>1905</S> his<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S>, How long<S>4214</S> is it<S>2076</S> ago<S>5550</S> since<S>5613</S> this<S>5124</S> came<S>1096</S> unto him<S>846</S>? And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S>, Of a child<S>3812</S>.
And<S>2532</S> ofttimes<S>4178</S> it hath cast<S>906</S> him<S>846</S> into<S>2532</S> <S>1519</S> the fire<S>4442</S>, and<S>2532</S> into<S>1519</S> the waters<S>5204</S>, to<S>2443</S> destroy<S>622</S> him<S>846</S>: but<S>235</S> if<S>1536</S> thou canst<S>1410</S> do any thing<S>1536</S>, have compassion<S>4697</S> on<S>1909</S> us<S>2248</S>, and help<S>997</S> us<S>2254</S>.
<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, If<S>1487</S> thou canst<S>1410</S> believe<S>4100</S>, all things<S>3956</S> are possible<S>1415</S> to him<S>846</S> that believeth<S>4100</S>.
And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> the father<S>3962</S> of the child<S>3813</S> cried out<S>2896</S>, and said<S>3004</S> with<S>3326</S> tears<S>1144</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, I believe<S>4100</S>; help thou<S>997</S> mine<S>3450</S> unbelief<S>570</S>.
When<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> saw<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the people<S>3793</S> came running together<S>1998</S>, he rebuked<S>2008</S> the foul<S>169</S> spirit<S>4151</S>, saying<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>,  Thou dumb<S>216</S> and<S>2532</S> deaf<S>2974</S> spirit<S>4151</S>, I<S>1473</S> charge<S>2004</S> thee<S>4671</S>, come<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> enter<S>1525</S> no more<S>3371</S> into<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the spirit cried<S>2896</S>, and<S>2532</S> rent<S>4682</S> him<S>846</S> sore<S>4183</S>, and came out of him<S>1831</S>: and<S>2532</S> he was<S>1096</S> as<S>5616</S> one dead<S>3498</S>; insomuch<S>5620</S> that<S>3754</S> many<S>4183</S> said<S>3004</S>, He is dead<S>599</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> took<S>2902</S> him<S>846</S> by the hand<S>5495</S>, and lifted<S>1453</S> him<S>846</S> up<S>1453</S>; and<S>2532</S> he arose<S>450</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he<S>846</S> was come<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the house<S>3624</S>, his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S> privately<S>2596</S> <S>2398</S>, Why<S>3754</S> could<S>1410</S> not<S>3756</S> we<S>2249</S> cast<S>1544</S> him<S>846</S> out<S>1544</S>?
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, This<S>5124</S> kind<S>1085</S> can<S>1410</S> come forth<S>1831</S> by<S>1722</S> nothing<S>3762</S>, but<S>1508</S> by<S>1722</S> prayer<S>4335</S> and<S>2532</S> fasting<S>3521</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they departed<S>1831</S> thence<S>1564</S>, and passed<S>3899</S> through<S>1223</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>; and<S>2532</S> he would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>2443</S> any man<S>5100</S> should know<S>1097</S> it.
For<S>1063</S> he taught<S>1321</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, <S>3754</S> The Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> is delivered<S>3860</S> into<S>1519</S> the hands<S>5495</S> of men<S>444</S>, and<S>2532</S> they shall kill<S>615</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> after that he is killed<S>615</S>, he shall rise<S>450</S> the third<S>5154</S> day<S>2250</S>.
But<S>1161</S> they understood not<S>50</S> that saying<S>4487</S>, and<S>2532</S> were afraid<S>5399</S> to ask<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he came<S>2064</S> to<S>1519</S> Capernaum<S>2584</S>: and<S>2532</S> being<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> the house<S>3614</S> he asked<S>1905</S> them<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> was it that ye disputed<S>1260</S> among<S>4314</S> yourselves<S>1438</S> by<S>1722</S> the way<S>3598</S>?
But<S>1161</S> they held their peace<S>4623</S>: for<S>1063</S> by<S>1722</S> the way<S>3598</S> they had disputed<S>1256</S> among<S>4314</S> themselves<S>240</S>, who<S>5101</S> should be the greatest<S>3187</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he sat down<S>2523</S>, and called<S>5455</S> the twelve<S>1427</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, If any man<S>1536</S> desire<S>2309</S> to be<S>1511</S> first<S>4413</S>, the same shall be<S>2071</S> last<S>2078</S> of all<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> servant<S>1249</S> of all<S>3956</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he took<S>2983</S> a child<S>3813</S>, and set<S>2476</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> when he had taken<S>1723</S> him<S>846</S> in his arms<S>1723</S>, he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>,
Whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> shall receive<S>1209</S> one<S>1520</S> of such<S>5108</S> children<S>3813</S> in<S>1909</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>, receiveth<S>1209</S> me<S>1691</S>: and<S>2532</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> shall receive<S>1209</S> me<S>1691</S>, receiveth<S>1209</S> not<S>3756</S> me<S>1691</S>, but<S>235</S> him that sent<S>649</S> me<S>3165</S>.
And<S>1161</S> John<S>2491</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, we saw<S>1492</S> one<S>5100</S> casting out<S>1544</S> devils<S>1140</S> in thy<S>4675</S> name<S>3686</S>, and<S>3739</S> he followeth<S>190</S> not<S>3756</S> us<S>2254</S>: and<S>2532</S> we forbad<S>2967</S> him<S>846</S>, because<S>3754</S> he followeth<S>190</S> not<S>3756</S> us<S>2254</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S>, Forbid<S>2967</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3361</S>: for<S>1063</S> there is<S>2076</S> no man<S>3762</S> which<S>3739</S> shall do<S>4160</S> a miracle<S>1411</S> in<S>1909</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>, that<S>2532</S> can<S>1410</S> lightly<S>5035</S> speak evil<S>2551</S> of me<S>3165</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he that<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> against<S>2596</S> us<S>2257</S> is<S>2076</S> on<S>5228</S> our<S>2257</S> part<S>5228</S>.
For<S>1063</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall give<S>4222</S> you<S>5209</S> a cup<S>4221</S> of water<S>5204</S> to drink<S>4222</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>, because<S>3754</S> ye belong<S>2075</S> to Christ<S>5547</S>, verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, he shall<S>622</S> not<S>3364</S> lose<S>622</S> his<S>846</S> reward<S>3408</S>.
And<S>2532</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall offend<S>4624</S> one<S>1520</S> of these little ones<S>3398</S> that believe<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S>, it is<S>2076</S> better<S>2570</S> <S>3123</S> for him<S>846</S> that<S>1487</S> a millstone<S>3037</S> <S>3457</S> were hanged<S>4029</S> about<S>4012</S> his<S>846</S> neck<S>5137</S>, and<S>2532</S> he were cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the sea<S>2281</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> thy<S>4675</S> hand<S>5495</S> offend<S>4624</S> thee<S>4571</S>, cut<S>609</S> it<S>846</S> off<S>609</S>: it is<S>2076</S> better<S>2570</S> for thee<S>4671</S> to enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S> maimed<S>2948</S>, than<S>2228</S> having<S>2192</S> two<S>1417</S> hands<S>5495</S> to go<S>565</S> into<S>1519</S> hell<S>1067</S>, into<S>1519</S> the fire<S>4442</S> that never shall be quenched<S>762</S>: <sup>offend: or, cause thee to offend</sup>
Where<S>3699</S> their<S>846</S> worm<S>4663</S> dieth<S>5053</S> not<S>3756</S>, and<S>2532</S> the fire<S>4442</S> is<S>4570</S> not<S>3756</S> quenched<S>4570</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> thy<S>4675</S> foot<S>4228</S> offend<S>4624</S> thee<S>4571</S>, cut<S>609</S> it<S>846</S> off<S>609</S>: it is<S>2076</S> better<S>2570</S> for thee<S>4671</S> to enter<S>1525</S> halt<S>5560</S> into<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S>, than<S>2228</S> having<S>2192</S> two<S>1417</S> feet<S>4228</S> to be cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> hell<S>1067</S>, into<S>1519</S> the fire<S>4442</S> that never shall be quenched<S>762</S>: <sup>offend: or, cause thee to offend</sup>
Where<S>3699</S> their<S>846</S> worm<S>4663</S> dieth<S>5053</S> not<S>3756</S>, and<S>2532</S> the fire<S>4442</S> is<S>4570</S> not<S>3756</S> quenched<S>4570</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> thine<S>4675</S> eye<S>3788</S> offend<S>4624</S> thee<S>4571</S>, pluck<S>1544</S> it<S>846</S> out<S>1544</S>: it is<S>2076</S> better<S>2570</S> for thee<S>4671</S> to enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S> with one eye<S>3442</S>, than<S>2228</S> having<S>2192</S> two<S>1417</S> eyes<S>3788</S> to be cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> hell<S>1067</S> fire<S>4442</S>: <sup>offend: or, cause thee to offend</sup>
Where<S>3699</S> their<S>846</S> worm<S>4663</S> dieth<S>5053</S> not<S>3756</S>, and<S>2532</S> the fire<S>4442</S> is<S>4570</S> not<S>3756</S> quenched<S>4570</S>.
For<S>1063</S> every one<S>3956</S> shall be salted<S>233</S> with fire<S>4442</S>, and<S>2532</S> every<S>3956</S> sacrifice<S>2378</S> shall be salted<S>233</S> with salt<S>251</S>.
Salt<S>217</S> is good<S>2570</S>: but<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> the salt<S>217</S> have lost<S>1096</S> his saltness<S>358</S>, wherewith<S>1722</S> <S>5101</S> will ye season<S>741</S> it<S>846</S>? Have<S>2192</S> salt<S>217</S> in<S>1722</S> yourselves<S>1438</S>, and<S>2532</S> have peace<S>1514</S> one<S>240</S> with<S>1722</S> another<S>240</S>.
